entry.title: Telegram Bot Tokens Surge Toward $100M Market Cap
entry.summary: The sector has experienced massive growth in a short period, as projects such as Unibot and Ready Swap flood the markets.

entry.title: Museums and Galleries Are Embracing Digital Art, Exploring AI
entry.summary: The future of art, its accessibility, and its audience were explored at Christie’s Art+Tech Summit.

entry.title: ChatGPT's Performance Is Slipping, New Study Says
entry.summary: UC Berkeley researchers found that ChatGPT has not improved over time, and in fact, may have gotten worse.

entry.title: 8 Billion People Will Go On-Chain Over the Next Decade: Coinbase Protocols Lead
entry.summary: Jesse Pollak is leading the exchange’s efforts on Base, its Ethereum-focused layer-2 network.

entry.title: Orgasm NFTs? NARS Cosmetics Brand Reveals Eyebrow-Raising Art Auctions
entry.summary: NARS has teamed up with SuperRare and digital artists to drop NFTs for National Orgasm Day, continuing a trend for the beauty brand.

entry.title: How to Start Playing Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop'—Do You Need an NFT?
entry.summary: Deadrop is currently in limited early access. Here’s how to unlock the first-person shooter game from Midnight Society.

entry.title: Apple Is Quietly Creating an AI Chatbot to Compete With ChatGPT: Report
entry.summary: Unlike ChatGPT, Apple’s tool isn’t meant for public consumption, and the company has no plans to release it to consumers.

entry.title: Russia to Start Testing ‘Digital Ruble’ CBDC in August Barring Putin's Veto
entry.summary: The bill still requires Vladimir Putin’s signature, but if approved, Russia will become one of the largest adopters of CBDCs to date.

entry.title: Italian Soccer Club AC Milan Extends Crypto Sponsorship With BitMEX
entry.summary: Soccer giant AC Milan is sticking with BitMEX, two years after naming the exchange its official cryptocurrency trading partner.

entry.title: Bipartisan Bill Would Give US Treasury Authority Over DeFi
entry.summary: The bill’s sponsors highlighted DeFi and crypto ATMs as vectors for financial crime.

entry.title: Why Jackson Pollock’s Historic Paint-Splattered Floor Is Being Immortalized as NFTs
entry.summary: An art collection from the Jackson Pollock Studio and Iconic Moments digitally preserves the famed painter's studio floor on Ethereum.

entry.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Wants Bitcoin Backed U.S. Dollars and Tax Breaks for Investors
entry.summary: “Bitcoin is among the hardest currencies and the Kennedy administration is going to encourage its proliferation and propagation,” he said.

entry.title: AI Won’t Replace Human Spies, Says Britain’s MI6 Chief
entry.summary: The head of Britain’s SIS says ‘human factors’ important in intelligence gathering can’t yet be replicated by AI.

entry.title: Nasdaq Delays Crypto Custody Until Regulatory Concerns Die Down
entry.summary: But Nasdaq CEO Adena Friedman said that the company would “remain committed to supporting the evolution of the digital asset ecosystem.”

entry.title: Cymbal Launches 'Human Readable' Ethereum Blockchain Explorer—A Social Etherscan
entry.summary: Unlike traditional explorers that can be difficult to understand, Cymbal is both visual and social—and aimed at the masses.

entry.title: What is MiCA? What the EU Crypto Governing Framework Means for You
entry.summary: MiCA does not cover most NFTs (except fractionalized NFTs and NFTs released as collections). Similarly, it does not cover DeFi apps that exist without an intermediary.

entry.title: Solana Wants More Games—This Simple Tool Could Help Developers
entry.summary: GameShift from Solana Labs aims to make blockchain game development easier for newcomers and traditional game studios alike.

entry.title: Ethereum ICO Whale Moves $116M in ETH to Kraken
entry.summary: Yet another dormant Ethereum wallet that participated in the project’s ICO has woken up after years of slumber.

entry.title: Doodles Launching Real World Play Experience in Chicago With Camp
entry.summary: The Pharrell Williams-backed NFT project Doodles is expanding further into the real world in partnership with “shop-and-play” retailer Camp.

entry.title: Société Générale’s Crypto Division Is First To Gain Full License From French Regulator
entry.summary: While more than 80 companies are registered with the AMF, SG Forge is the first to be licensed.

entry.title: Chinese Police Arrest 21 in $54M USDT Money Laundering Probe
entry.summary: The suspects allegedly purchased Tether’s stablecoin over-the-counter and sold it at inflated prices over WeChat.

entry.title: ZK Virtual Machine Developer RISC Zero Raises $40M in Series A
entry.summary: Thanks to the new funding, the Seattle-based startup is getting closer to the launch of its computing platform.

entry.title: Dev Team p0x Labs Raises $25M for Zero-Knowledge Ecosystem Manta Network
entry.summary: The funding round for p0x labs — which has delivered a valuation of $500 million — was led by Polychain Capital and Qiming Venture Partners.

entry.title: Genesis Trading Saw 'Uptick' in Altcoin Activity After Ripple SEC Decision
entry.summary: The institutional trading platform’s head of sales explains that the XRP ruling is the latest in a "series of bullish events" for crypto.

entry.title: XRP Gains 6% on Possible SEC Settlement Conference, Ripple Metaverse Investment
entry.summary: XRP outperforms the crypto market as hopes of settlement with the SEC and metaverse investment boost buyer sentiments.

entry.title: Crypto.com Adds Reddit’s Moons Token as Kraken Listing Rumor Fades
entry.summary: The listing caused the token's value to double for the second day in a row.

entry.title: 'Assassin's Creed' Creator Ubisoft Throws Weight Behind Cronos Blockchain
entry.summary: The gaming giant continues expanding across the blockchain space, this time as a Cronos blockchain validator.

entry.title: OpenAI Donates $5 Million to the American Journalism Project
entry.summary: The ChatGPT creator previously inked a deal with the Associated Press and Shutterstock.

entry.title: Ex-Google Exec Predicts AI Sex Robots Could Replace Human Intimacy
entry.summary: Could AI be taking over our jobs—and replacing our sex partners?

entry.title: 'Neopets' Cancels NFT Game After Raising Money From Polygon, Avalanche
entry.summary: Despite $4 million in funding from crypto firms, Neopets is ditching NFTs—and making a game that can "better reflect our values and vision."

entry.title: Coinfund Raises $158 Million to Boost Early-Stage Crypto, AI Startups
entry.summary: The company is launching a new fund after a tumultuous year where many players pulled back from cryptocurrency plays.

entry.title: Congressman Torres Tells SEC Chairman to End Crypto ‘Crusade’ After Ripple Ruling
entry.summary: The politician says it's time for the SEC to get comfortable with the “Torres Doctrine.”

entry.title: What Are Decentralized Marketplaces?
entry.summary: Decentralized marketplaces are what blockchains are all about. They allow people to interact and transact on a global, permission-less, and self-executing platform. Houses, hot sauce, and t-shirts can all be bought and sold without needing to trust a middleman.

entry.title: What are cryptocurrency wallets?
entry.summary: Wallets are pieces of software that allow a user to hold cryptocurrency. The movement of cryptocurrencies to and from and wallets are controlled by public and private keys. There are several different types of wallets, characterised by their internet connectivity.

entry.title: Microsoft Broadens AI Bets Beyond OpenAI With Meta Alliance
entry.summary: Integrating LLama 2 into the Azure cloud-computing platform brings together two tech titans.

entry.title: Vitalik Buterin Explains How Ethereum Plans to Make Crypto Wallets as Simple as Email
entry.summary: Account abstraction, which would make it possible to store seed phrases in smart contracts, is "a pretty big deal," he said.

entry.title: Asset Managers Back Bitcoin But Hold More Ethereum in CoinShares Poll
entry.summary: A new survey offers a tantalizing insight into sentiment among institutions—and it's clear that BlackRock's filing for a spot Bitcoin ETF has had a huge impact.

entry.title: Opepen PFPs Are Taking Over NFT Twitter—Here's What's Going On
entry.summary: The Opepen NFT collection from Jack Butcher became the center of a viral trend on Crypto Twitter, driving up engagement—and prices.

entry.title: Arkham’s ‘Dox-to-Earn’ Platform Offers Bounty on $415 Million FTX Mystery
entry.summary: The company's so-called Intel Exchange went live and Arkham itself has posted its largest bounty.

entry.title: Bitcoin Cools and Drops Below $30,000—But XRP, Chainlink Surging
entry.summary: Bitcoin has again dropped below $30,000 per coin. But these altcoins are surging.

entry.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.

entry.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO
entry.summary: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.

entry.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.

entry.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers
entry.summary: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.

entry.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder
entry.summary: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.

entry.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?
entry.summary: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.

entry.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.

entry.title: Behind the Scenes with AMGI Studios and My Pet Hooligan
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes to Burbank, California for a behind-the-scenes tour of AMGI Studios, the developers of upcoming game My Pet Hooligan.

entry.title: Why Legend of Arcardia Chose Sui Over EVM Chains
entry.summary: Legend of Arcadia Executive Producer Andy Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game and why they switched from EVM to new protocol Sui.

entry.title: Rumble Racing Star Game Preview: Is This Mario Kart With NFTs?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin shares a first look at Delabs' upcoming lawn mower racing game Rumble Racing Star, which offers a large cast of quirky characters pulled from the worlds of Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins, and more.

entry.title: Why Laguna Games Turned Down 'Game of Thrones' for Crypto Unicorns
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Laguna Games about why the team chose to move away from an offer with WB Games to develop a Game of Thrones licensed title—and made Crypto Unicorns instead.

entry.title: Mythical Games CEO John Linden on NFL Rivals Topping 1M Downloads
entry.summary: Mythical Games just raised a $37 million Series C1 round on the back of the early success of NFL Rivals, which has already topped a million downloads in two months. Mythical CEO John Linden joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the launch and impact of NFL Rivals.

entry.title: How Ava Labs Is Approaching Gaming on Avalanche
entry.summary: At 3XP, Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss some of the biggest Avalanche-based games on the horizon and how the company is approaching and thinking about Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Ogimi Founder David Gull on Why AI Should Be Your Meditation Coach
entry.summary: Ogimi founder David Gull speaks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about its AI-driven meditation guides and how the technology can enable a more unique, custom-tailored meditation experience for users.

entry.title: VaynerSports Gaming VP Discusses Web3 Content Creators, Decentralized Streaming
entry.summary: Darren Glover, VP of Gaming at talent management agency VaynerSports, sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss the challenges faced by Web3-centric content creators, the current state of the esports market, and how decentralized streaming platforms can challenge centralized leaders like Twitch.

entry.title: NYXL Co-Founder on the State of Esports and Crypto Gaming
entry.summary: Rohit Gupta, co-founder of esports team NYXL, chats with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss challenges faced by the esports industry and opportunities and experiments in Web3.

entry.title: What Is GameBridge? Inside Shrapnel's Gaming Innovation
entry.summary: Marc Mercuri, Head of Platform for Web3 shooter Shrapnel, speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo about GameBridge, a feature that simplifies blockchain item composability and interoperability.

entry.title: Gods Unchained Executive Producer Discusses Epic Games Store Move
entry.summary: Daniel Paez, Executive Producer on Immutable X-based card-battler Gods Unchained, discusses the long-running NFT game's launch on the Epic Games Store and the opportunity it provides.
